author: Mara Gay
title: New York Mayor Bill de Blasio to Build Jail in the Bronx
text:
New York City plans to build a new jail in the Bronx, the first of several smaller jails Mayor Bill de Blasio has said he would renovate or open as part of a decadelong plan to close the troubled complex on Rikers Island.
The new facility will be opened at 320 Concord Ave. in the Bronxâ€™s Mott Haven neighborhood, according to a person familiar with the proposal. This person said the building most recently has been used by the New York Police Department and that it would have to undergo renovations to be used as a jail.
